pages.text: $(l)If you look above your hunger you will notice the thirst bar, but don't worry, dealing with thirst is easy;$()$(br2)-Water Sources:$(br)You can drink from water sources like lakes but that will end making you sick, giving you the 'Thirst Effect'.

$(a)-The Thirst Effect:$(br)$()During the duration of the effect, your thirst bar will drain faster and you will take damage periodically.$(br)Depending from where you drank the dirty water the effect may last longer.
$(br2)-Flasks:$(br)Upgradeable and a way better option than drinking from the floor, while the chances are smaller you can still get sick if you drink untreated water from it.
$(br2)-Water Bottles:$(br)Like the flask the chances of getting sick drinking from a water bottle are smaller but also higher than with a flask, boil it in a furnace or campfire!

pages.title: Water Treatment
pages.text: Water can be purified in a campfire cauldron, just put water in it and wait for a awhile, then fill your flasks up with clean water.$(br2)Copper Cauldrons can be used to store clean water, will also slowly fill when it rains.
